name: Smiling Bear: Attack
description:
What is Smiling Bear: Attack?

It is a simple child friendly game. You play the part of Smiling Bear who wants to make sad faces happy by shooting at them with pink hearts. There are different levels with varying degrees of difficulty.

I designed this game with my kids. I made it for many reasons. To introduce a passion of mine to them. To get them excited about being creative. Perhaps most importantly just to have fun.

My family had the wonderful idea to share it with the world.

All this work was done by your family?

You bet! My family and I did all the art work, and I built the game. The music is done by my brother who happens to do this sort of thing professionally! He created the wonderful music for the game.
